name: The Depths (galexz)
description:
Explore the dungeons in the depths of an unknown location, fight 2 bosses and 3 enemies with 9 different weapons, and find out how long you can survive.

How To Play:

For the best experience, play in full screen.

Once you start there will be a weapon in the middle of the room, pick it up and go through the door at the top of the screen to go to the next room, new weapons will drop from enemies and bosses, so keep your eye out for them. You have 6 health shown at the top left of the screen if that drops to 0 you will die.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to Move

Left Click to Shoot
